shipping-main-paragraph: At CloudSocks, we strive to provide a seamless shopping experience for our customers. Here's a brief overview of our shipping and return policies:
shipping-last-paragraph: Please note that shipping costs are non-refundable, and customers are responsible for return shipping fees unless the return is due to a defective or incorrect item.

sections.heading: Shipping Policy:
sections.paragraph: Processing Time: Orders are processed within 1-2 business days.
sections.paragraph1: Shipping Methods: We offer standard and expedited shipping options at checkout.
sections.paragraph2: Shipping Rates: Shipping costs are calculated based on your location and selected shipping method.
sections.paragraph3: Delivery Time: Standard shipping typically takes 3-5 business days, while expedited shipping arrives within 1-3 business days.

sections.heading: Return Policy:
sections.paragraph: Eligibility: Items must be returned within 30 days of purchase, unused, unworn, and in their original packaging.
sections.paragraph1: Process: To initiate a return, please contact our customer service team with your order details.
sections.paragraph2: Refunds: Once we receive and inspect the returned item, refunds will be processed to the original payment method within 5-7 business days.
sections.paragraph3: Exchanges: If you wish to exchange an item, please specify the desired product when contacting customer service.
